story.name: You
story.text: Sorry about that... who are you?

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: I'm Lil Jacob! And you are?

choices: Well I just started interning here a few days back…
I’m me haha… though perhaps this isn’t the time for humor...

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Ah the new intern! No wonder I haven’t seen you before! It’s nice to meet you!

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Hmm, I suppose you're right, me. Let me just do a scan... Ah it appears you're the new intern.

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: You look a bit confused. Is something wrong?

story.name: You
story.text: To be honest, I'm not sure what's going on. One moment I'm looking at a fossil sample and the next alarms are blaring and...

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: Ah! The flood! That's why you see me running around! I’m only activated after an emergency to help clean up. If you haven't seen yet, the entire base flooded and there were some nasty ruptures on the hull I had to patch.

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: So long as everyone followed protocol, they should be safely dormant in their stasis pods until help arrives.

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: Now that begs the question... why are you not in yours?

choices: I'm not so sure myself. You have any ideas?
I guess I'm just unlucky. Say, is the rest of the base still flooded?

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Well then, let's have a look at that pod of yours.

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Looks like yours had a malfunction. Wow, you're lucky HQ didn't flood or else... well let's just say you're lucky to be alive.

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Everywhere else is filled with water and-

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Unfortunately all the other rooms are filled with water and I can’t seem to get the systems running to flush it out.

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: But now that you’re awake, maybe you can help me get things going! Security is just next door so why don’t we try and get over there? I'm sure we can-

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: Quick, take cover! It's... it's a... a

story.name: Lil Jacob
story.text: Just a worm? Just a worm! I'll have you know this place is crawling with things much bigger than just 'worms!' In fact, I wouldn't be surprised if you found 'worms' skulking around the entire base!

choices: I'm sure I can handle a few worms.
Oh, I guess I'll keep an eye out then.

responses.name: You
responses.text: See? Not so scary. If anything else comes our way, I'll make sure to take care of it. Now let's head over to security.

responses.name: Lil Jacob
responses.text: Let's find a way around that worm and head to security.
